website_summaries.verdict: A spacious and well divided storage bag to keep your yarn organized and functional.
pros: Interior dividers keep yarn well organized
Clear lid has 6 holes so you can easily work with yarn from inside of the bag
Available in multiple colors and sizes
Plenty of additional storage pockets available for spare yarn, tools, and accessories
cons: Large bag may be too bulky to travel with

customer_reviews.title: Love it... A must have...
customer_reviews.text: OMG this bag is awesome... Its a lot bigger then I thought... Anyone that want to buy this bag you should get the large... Its only $3 more then the small... Lots of pockets very roomy...
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bear

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I am a knitter and a crocheter and I always have projects. I want them organized and clean, away from my curious cats who love yarn as much as I do. I would love to have seen someone to develop more packets. I am so happy to have this bag now, so I can simply leave my stuff inside of it and just pick it up and everything is the way I left it. Erika
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA B.

customer_reviews.title: if you like bags.
customer_reviews.text: I must tell everyone ... if you like bags... if you like being organized... this is the bag for you. My co-workers were so over hearing me brag about my new bag everytime a new person would walk in. I LOVE this bag. I spent 2 hours on my porch playing with it, filling it, arranging it, and seeing how much I could put in it. WOW. It held everything with room to spare. I can not stop bragging about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It needs support.
customer_reviews.text: I love this yarn bag. It's holds all sizes of yarn (tho the big skeins will take up 2 slots) its perfect holds everything nicely. My only complaint is that it is squishable. The yarn holds up one side great untill it starts to run out the other side drupes down. But it's not that big a deal I stick cardboard on the sides inside to up support the bag. If it weren't for that I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Big, awesome bag.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to work, showed it to the other yarn-crafting team members, and they loved it so much they've ordered theirs already. It's a big, roomy bag. I currently have two sets of crochet hooks, misc tools, and 9 skeins of yarn (3 in cakes), and still have room for more. A bit bulky for air travel, but good for moving lots of stuff at once. And there is NO VELCRO in it to snag and felt the yarn. My only gripe is the plastic overlay beneath the lid. It's honestly kind of useless for me. I'd have been happer if it contained another pouch, and closed completely.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Project Bag/Tote
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tote. It holds a large project with a space for active and reserve materials. Several organized slots to keep things neat while working and storing and an attached zippered case to carry hooks and needles. The item loses one star because it is a bit wide to fit comfortably under my arm, but the trade-off of the extra space if worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bluebirdsisee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Find for crocheters and knitters alike.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for me. I needed something to carry my yarn and projects in and was able to carry 4 different projects along with all my hooks and the directions for each project. It kept everything very well organized I am hoping to later on get a second one as I do like the idea of the small grommet holes on the one side to allow the yarn to go through. The only thing I would have prefered is that there was two grommet holes per slot that holds 2 different skeins of yarn. But over all it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteDove

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy my bag and find it it keeps my crochet ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my bag and find it it keeps my crochet tools and yarn well-organized. My only negative (but I think most people would view as positive) is that it is larger than I expected. I was expecting it would be small enough to grab and carry to the doctor's office or other places I would find myself without taking up much room. It is actually about as large as a full sized diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Have everything that I need in one place and it is a joy to have no worries that something that I need ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a revolutionary awakening for me, now able to bring my complete supplies to my knitting/crochet classes that I teach. Have everything that I need in one place and it is a joy to have no worries that something that I need in class will be missed or forgotten at home. The construction is A+ as is the design. Wonderful, wonderful, I am so happy with this product. A+ to the vendor for the fast delivery and the product, only wish that I had it years ago, it would have saved so much carrying as it has a place for everything I need for my classes and my personal enjoyment of my craft. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Anne N. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: I love this storage case
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage case. I've been able to fit multiple skeins of both regular size red heart super saver and the red heart jumbo/caron one pound skeins. It's held up nicely since I got it, and assuming you don't get yarn barf, the holes at the top for the yarn to go through work really well to keep the yarn untangled.
customer_reviews.author: Maia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate knitting bag! It holders many project. If you are like me you always have more than one project going and need to take them with you depending on what you want to work on. Good quality! I can put knitting and cross stitch projects into it. Everyone who sees it asks my where I got it. The straps are strong and it opens up so you can see everything inside. Lots of compartments for everything can stay organize.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Bag is great in size and organizing
customer_reviews.text: Bag is great in size and organizing. However the Velcro on the project flap was sewn on backwards and doesn't work, there-for it does not keep my cats from getting in it and destroying my work, which was the purpose of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: rdtrbl

customer_reviews.title: Beats The Laundry Basket
customer_reviews.text: My wife used to keep her yarn and projects in a laundry basket. After using this bag for a couple of months, she really loves it. Her only slightly-negative comment so far is that for something big like an Afghan, there isn't enough room for both yarn and the finished piece as it grows.
customer_reviews.author: fgr33n

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy, durable, and organized. I LOVE THIS BAG!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can keep my yarn and all of my knitting needles, and other knitting accessories organized. Now I can keep everything neatly tucked away so my yorkie puppy can't get to them and destroy my projects thinking that they're his toys. When I'm ready to go meet with my knitting club, all I have to do is grab my bag and go because everything's already packed and ready. I was a little concerned that the PVC plastic wouldn't be very durable but when I received the bag, there was no reason for concern. The plastic is thick and very durable. I would definitely recommend this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: B Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knitting/crochet bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I love all of the compartments and the holes for feeding yarn through. A great size for carrying projects and related accessories. My only wish would be for an additional top cover in a matching material versus the clear in case I have to store the bag for a while - unlikely, but possible. It would be great to think that dust couldn't get in. Or if I were to go out in the rain. But that is really a minor, picky detail. Would love to see it in some colorful patterns but the gray dots are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Egh... so so
customer_reviews.text: Although this is pictured to be exactly like the Hoshin I recently bought it's not. It's smaller and seems more fragile. The bins for the yarn skeins are smaller, the clear plastic covers are more flimsy, and the overall look of the bag is cheap. It will do but I will not mistakenly order another one. The Hoshin is a Much Better bag!
customer_reviews.author: bjratc01

customer_reviews.title: It's a necessity
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It has a lot of space and also a nice big pocket to keep my WIP pieces in. It also has hook holders and lots of pockets, which is really helpful. The only thing I would fix is that there's nothing to attach your loose yarn at the top to and nothing to cover it. The clear top isn't covered, so I just have to be careful not to snag the exposed yarn when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Pinecone

customer_reviews.title: Holds *almost* everything
customer_reviews.text: I crochet a lot at work; so this bag was a need for me. I love how all my hooks have a place and all of my other tools fit as well. It holds fairly large skeins with ease. The only downside i'd have for it is I wish the center divider was removable. I often find that the space to put my work in progress isn't large enough and I'm stuck stuffing it in. I also got the one without the cover. I wish i got the cover; but it did not come in the blue that I wanted. Overall, I do enjoy this bag and use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can already tell I’m going to love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a portable project kit that I could take with me or move from room to room. Even though I am not using it for yarn it is perfect for what I needed it for. The small size was exactly what I was looking for. It is made well has plenty of room and compartments.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: No top cover.  My mistake.
customer_reviews.text: I like the capacity of this knitting bag. I do wish it can with a top cover. It is not really usable for travel without it. I do see looking back that there is a version with the lid. I don't understand why the cost is so much higher for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Giraffe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for large projects
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Great quality, and so many places for storage! I was using it for a graphgan that required 7 different colors. This helped keep my skeins of yarn separate and tidy, store my patterns and hook also. I'd definitely recommend this to any crocheters that do a lot of color change projects or C2C blankets. It's a space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and the organization
customer_reviews.text: Thus bag is seriously a must have for the knitter who likes to carry around their projects, multiple knitting needles, yarn, and accessories for spur of the moment new projects. It is SO roomy and I carry around A LOT of gear. I still have plenty of room to add more things if I needed to and it keeps all of my yarn nicely so they don’t unravel and tangle up like my old bag. DO NOT hesitate to buy this as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Penello

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying this tote! It holds a ton of stuff as well as the project. Only thing I don’t like is the small holes for the yarn to travel through as they aren’t covered at all so that yarn is completely exposed and right now I’m working on a white baby blanket and can’t risk it getting dirty so can’t use this for it! It holds all my supplies and tons of yarn! Well constructed and good zippers! Love having both short and long handles.
customer_reviews.author: KidNMusicLover

customer_reviews.title: Immediate defect
customer_reviews.text: The metal piece where the yarn goes through came off while I was unpacking the tote. I'm very sad and disappointed. I don't want to have to go through the entire return and reorder process.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Made well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. You can keep everything you need for your project in it. I am working on the huge project that takes many bobbins of yarn. It helps me keep them sorted easier. Plus you can store many other hooks or needles, or other accessories you use to crochet or knit. It’s a one stop shop bag for your knitting and crocheting projects. I like the zipper pocket on top where I can keep the accessories I am using for my current project. My iPad fits in one of the side pockets too. So I can take just one bag with me when I am taking my project with me. So far it has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Cheryl L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is GREAT!! The quality of construction, size and capacity are Awesome!! It holds everything I need for my crochet amigurumi, including the stuffing!! However it's still very compact and great to grab and go when traveling!! I Love the see-through top and easy access to my materials. Wish it came in more colors, and I regret that I didn't order more than one during the Amazon Prime Days when it was just $20!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mays

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Love the yarn compartments with the dispenser/Velcro on the top. Dislike: When it said it holds up to 14" needles, they barely fit, and only a few at a time without chancing the tips will puncture through the plastic. To keep all of my needles in one place, I fashioned a holder from thin carboard and bubble wrap for the side pockets. They can all stand up without flopping around or damaging the tips.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag ever. The pockets are big and even a spot for all my crochet hooks and more. I love it. My last bag(different brand) all the zippers broke and the strap ripped after a month.
customer_reviews.author: minx

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: A little more than I wanted to spend for a bag that has a cover. This bag holds a lot more than I had expected. Having the cover is also good because it keeps things enclosed and clean. The only issue I had is that the skeins of some types of yarn does not fit in the 5 spots open for yarn but made I made it work. Same with the crochet hooks spots. They are a bit bigger than the standard hooks are. Made for the ones with hand grips on them but also made that work.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag for organizing my work in progress. I crochet and this is the best bag I've had to date. There are SO many features! If your doing Corner 2 Corner (C2C) you can clip your bobbins on the flap that is magnetic and just turn your bag when you turn your project. No tangles!
customer_reviews.author: Dva

customer_reviews.title: Great value, unbelievable storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing storage bag. If you do any yarn crafts, this is a must. I don't know how I survived before. I use it to hold everything I need for a blanket I'm knitting (but that's because I have too much knitting stuff and they're in stackable boxes) but I'm sure it'd be perfect for a casual and not crazy knitter who clearly has a problem. It has more storage than it looks like from the outside. It is a great value. I may buy another if I start the second blanket I'm considering.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Spaunhorst

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I had a tough time choosing which size would work better, so I ordered both since the seller offered free return shipping. Both bags were very nice, roomy, lots of pockets plus having both hand and shoulder straps. The smaller one would be easier for toting around, however, I wanted to be able to keep all supplies together and hopefully not outgrow it (!), so I kept the large one. It is about the size of a diaper bag. Seems well made and well thought out. I didn't buy the expensive cover, but the flaps do close up the top without sealing (would let in some dust and rain. I think the grey dot pattern is attractive without being cutesy.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I must have looked at over a dozen different bags for my knitting things. I'm still pretty new at knitting but I knew that I needed a bag that will hold my essentials and projects, this is definitely my perfect bag. It's very roomy, I love the clear top and all the yarn pockets. I also love the outside pockets. I especially like the fact that I dont have to remove everything from the bag to find something like my yarn needles or markers/ counter. I believe that this will also be a good bag to take with when traveling. Well thought out. I would recommend it to anyone and everyone. Its sturdy, pretty and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Rens

customer_reviews.title: Great product but plan ahead - 3 wks+ for delivery! !!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem is that my husband ordered it for Christmas. Literally it must have been delivered via slow boat from China. It was finally delivered a few days ago!! It's almost 3 weeks into January. By that time, my son gave me a nice larger one for Christmas. So I really didn't need two. However, this was much smaller, has great storage, is compact and great for traveling! I really do like it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Page

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tote for Loom Knitters!
customer_reviews.text: I use this tote for travel and for home storage for my current loom knitting project! Its a roomy tote! It has slots for several skeins of yarn, large area for looms, front and back zippered pockets (1 for books and 1 for accessories), pockets on each end (1 is clear), and a small clear zippered pocket on top. It also has carry straps and also a shoulder strap. I LOVE THIS BAG—Perfect tote for Loom Knitters!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama14

customer_reviews.title: Big Sturdy project bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my larger projects and to hold extra yarn when traveling. There are several compartments which makes it easy to Organize extra needles/hooks/notions. I have had this thing for a while and never regretted the purchase. It’s large and very sturdy. Great purchase for anyone who loves to knit or crochet. The front pocket definitely works better for crochet hooks but I use the pocket in the back for my knitting needles and patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Le Blanc

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have two, one for each project I'm working on. Plenty of room. Although, if u purchase super saver skeins, u can only have two to three in pouches, because the tighter it is the more tension on the yarn coming out as your working. The large pouch inside is big enough for extra skeins, and partial projects. The zipper pocket is large enough for 14" hooks (diagonal) and hook kits. Back zipper pocket fits books or patterns and the two end pockets are easily accessible for scissors, ruler, or tools used while working.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big! It allows for carrying many things. There are holes provided to put your yarn they if you want. The compartments hold standard size skeins, but not the extra large. Still a great buy, and most people will find a way to still carry the extra large skeins if that is what they use.
customer_reviews.author: TooHonest

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag for my crocheting needs
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag! Lots of great compartments to easily store and organize everything. Construction seems solid, and it's taken a beating and still looks amazing. I have received many compliments on the bag too. Highly recommend for all crafters who want to take their fibers on the road!
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Teamoy Knitting bag
customer_reviews.text: Was what I expected and did not disappoint. Nice having all my project necessities in one place. Easy to grab and go. Has space for other items I may want to carry with me. I crochet so do not let the word knitting keep you from this yarn organizer.
customer_reviews.author: bjcj

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has so many great features. The only con is the size - it is pretty big and boxy to use as a take along craft bag (for waiting rooms, etc.). But the size is also awesome because it can hold so much. Some reviewers raised quality concerns due to the velcro closures being sewn on incorrectly, but actually that is part of the design. There are velcro strips along the top to hold yarn ends, not to hold the bag closed. This is a neat feature! It is perfect for avoiding the tangled mess I usually end up with when using multiple colors on the same project or when working with double strands.
customer_reviews.author: L. Polo

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling and storage. Worth the money. I returned the large for the smaller one. If I take it on a cruise I have enough room in the small to fit enough skeins to make a sweater. It has handles and also a shoulder strap. It is light weight. Glad I bought it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product to carry a few separate yarn projects.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until the shoulder strap connector broke, making it impsossible to use as a shoulder bag months is a good enough life for that type of equipment. It looks durable, but apparently is not in that area. Otherwise it is a great bag for carrying a few different projects and accessories. I'm disappointed that I can't throw it on my shoulder any more as that enables me to carry other things in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: C. MCKEE

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it would recommend for anyone. So I needed a good portable crochet tote bag and I purchased this one. It met my expectations and totally worth the money. I was able to fit the blanket that I'm working on and it's pretty big and thick, I'm using the red heart super saver yarn. I have 5 skeins of yarn in each pouch along with the blanket and I had my iPad in it with my crochet hooks and it was still very light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of capacity and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I used to struggle to find a nice bag to hold my yarn and materials, but this was the perfect solution!! There is so much storage capacity in this bag! It isn’t intended, but i fit well over 15 skeins of yarn in this bag because of the way i stack it! Not to mention that the all black bag is super clean and aesthetically pleasing. A must-have for those who knit or crochet!!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for crafters
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't anyone buy me this bag sooner?! Works so well for multiple projects. My only complaint would be the hook holders. Doesn't accommodate the hooks with the holders on them and they slide. Would have been better with a closed pocket rather then thin stretchy strap. But I love this bag otherwise
customer_reviews.author: ataylor

customer_reviews.title: Wife's go-to yarn bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes yarn hats for charity, and she likes to have 3-4 hats prepped to be made at once so she doesn't need to cast-on each one when out of the house. This bag holds all the yarn she needs for the hats, and sets of needles pre-setup and cast on to begin, and keeps them from becoming a mess. A wonderful bag that my wife is already talking about buying a second of...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super roomy. Had enough space for all the items ...
customer_reviews.text: Super roomy. Had enough space for all the items I needed to make an extra large blanket. The blanket eventually was too large to place in the carrier, but that's fine, as it wasn't really a portable project. I just liked having everything I needed in the case. Very useful for anyone who likes to keep their items organized by project the way I do.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Lot Of Storage & Easy To Organize
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I waited so long to buy this bag! 1. Tons of storage space. 2. Easy to organize so everything you need can be found fast. 3. Easy to bring all of your supplies with you anywhere. I highly recommend this bag for everyone who crochets and/or knits. Great gift idea!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria R

customer_reviews.title: This bag works for those who use knitting looms, too!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The bag is attractive (I bought the polkadot pattern) and well made. There is enough room for plenty of yarn and still a section to keep your project while you are working on it. I chose this bag over a "yarn drum" style bag because I use knitting looms and wanted enough room to be able to hold a project or two on a loom. I was able to place all of my tools in the pockets and still have room for more. The bag doesn't have to be completely full to stand up on its own, which helps with the yarn feeding out of the bag without getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Witte

customer_reviews.title: Great yarn bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yarn bag. The only reason I gave it a 4 star was because I purchased it to store my longarm sewing supplies and I haven’t found a good way to store things in it yet. It holds my rulers, oil, fabric hair rollers, fabric, scrap batting to clean with, Clorox wipes to clean my tables... I really could keep going on. It doesn’t have good spots for needles, pins, pickers, and bandaids 😂. All in all a great bag for what it’s designed for. It is exactly how is describes it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Long

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: I really love this yarn tote. I ordered one for me about a year ago. Then I decided my oldest daughter needed something like this for her crocheting & ordered 1 for her for Christmas & had it delivered to her. She liked it as she could put her yarn it in & have the yarn come out the grommet holes. My daughter-in-law had seen me using mine outside in our yard & commenting on wanting 1 for herself. So I ordered 1 for her. She also love it. I also take this tote when I travel out of town. It fits in some pretty tight places inside a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lee Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and holds everything I need!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived the day before it was expected- I ordered late Thursday night and it arrived Monday afternoon and I don't even have Amazon Prime. I was concerned at first that it might not stand up and have stability, but the tote is very sturdy! I love that it allows me to organize the projects I have going so that I don't have my crafts taking over the whole house!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Must have been deigned by a person who knits or crochets  Nothing I would change about it!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this bag- the spacious, well- designed interior, the several exterior pockets, the way everything is not only organized but so easily accessible. Whoever designed this bag put a lot of thought into it. I will be buying another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Hillcrest

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The bag did not fit my Brother machine as described in the details. Buyers beware! I now have to get another bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary l.

customer_reviews.title: Inside pocket ripped already!
customer_reviews.text: This tote is a great size for carrying knitting and storage, HOWEVER, I have only had it 2 months and a hole developed in one of the inside pockets and my items in that pocket have now gone inside the bottom of the bag and I cannot get them out!! Will have to cut to inside to retrieve. Ridiculous for a $30 bag should have lasted longer! Sturdy outside and not inside😢
customer_reviews.author: cathy schwenkmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel, versatile, carry on
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this bag for the yarn-storage capabilities, but when I saw how much storage space there is, I decided to take it to Europe! So this bag (large with cover) will be my luggage instead of a suitcase for the next month. The large pocket in the back fits 3-4 skinny packing cubes and the other compartments can carry shoes and undies and such. Such a versatile bag!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs stiffer sides, but love the storage.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sides were stiffer. The sides cave in and my bag folds down. I need to straighten it up once in a while. I do like the clear top and the front zipper pocket is great. There is a back zipper pocket that I can keep books and extra needles.
customer_reviews.author: L Lund

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great! Have another circular bag with removable divider
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Have another circular bag with removable divider. Diver in that bag never stays in place and bag folds in on it’s self unless yarn & project support it. Not with this bag. I have yarn for sweater & scarve, my tools, and the project all in this bag (room to spare). When I take project out- bag stays standing, yarn stays put!
customer_reviews.author: SWEETP2U

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure this was my best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let it’s size fool you. I tote around at least 3 projects at any given time and it holds everything I need in a neat, organized way. I’m pretty sure this was my best purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.author: A.K

customer_reviews.title: Have tote will travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this tote/organizer. I use it to store the yarn needed and all the items needed for my current project. The best part is it is aways ready for travel whether it’s for a long trip or a day of sitting and waiting to get into appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet Mama 2

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It's everything that I need for my habit/love for crocheting. It didn't take long at all to arrive and arrived in a great package with a warranty. Examining the bag it's very roomy with many pockets for many items to store. Very durable with an extra handle attachment that will last a very long time. I been working with super saver yarn and put one in each pocket and still had room Thanks so much for the great product
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Brown-Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if was all snaps I love how much it ...
customer_reviews.text: The top does not stay closed. The flap has 2 snaps (on the sides) and 2 velcro pieces. On mine, the velcro will not stay attached and your yarn gets stuck in it. Would be great if was all snaps I love how much it holds, it could easily hold any project.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I can get so much into it and it so organized with all the pockets. I keep it next to my chair within easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bag. The green color is lovely. I love the front flap that holds all of my needles, scissors, needles etc etc. The inside has plenty of space for numerous balls of yarn. The holes to thread the yearn through are perfect. I didnt give it 5 stars because the top flap closes with buttons. If it had a wrap around zipper it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jessies Decor

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer that you can take along anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item. So perfect for keeping the yarn from getting tangled and for keeping all the project items together.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little big for traveling but I love this bag! I am so organized with my projects now and there is more than enough room for everything. I really like the functionality of the bag. You don’t have to unzip and undo a bunch of flaps to get to your projects and equipment. The clear plastic material is durable and makes it so easy to find things.
customer_reviews.author: Lee K

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Chridtmas gift for my 13-yr old granddaughter, who is an avid and accomplished knitter. She used to carry her knitting projects in a plastic bag and was delighted with this attractive carry-all. Well constructed with durable materials and innovative design.
customer_reviews.author: Piecemaker

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. It was bigger than I expected but perfect. I wish the additional opaque cover was also available in the small size but it’s only available on the larger model. I purchased the small size. I love it. You will be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for grab and go
customer_reviews.text: I'm working on a project that uses 11 different skeins of yarn. This bag holds them all, and all my accessories, and still has room for extra. I'm able to grab it and go and know my yarn wont tangle and I'll have everything I need with me. Was great for grabbing on the way to the park. The kids got to play, and I got to work on my project. IMO the cover is worth the extra cost, although I was able to grab this bag on a lightning deal which made the price a little easier to accept.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Got pets? Love to crochet? Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bag! FINALLY, something to hold yarn, hooks, scissors etc.... Everything you need for your project. Best of all, you can store your project as you go. Life saver for anyone with pets...and pet hair. Keeps my yarn fur free!
customer_reviews.author: bunnynanci

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I am used to but works perfectly for what I needed. I am making a project that needs 4 one-pound skeins. This bag has more than enough room for them plus extra space for other things
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I recently began teaching myself to knit. I bought lots of yarn, needles, etc...and needed somewhere to stow them so that the yarns wouldn't keep tangling. This knitting bag is roomier than I thought it would be, great storage for all of my WIPs and knitting accoutrements. I am thoroughly happy with this bag! I plan to buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Y.I. Washington

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ORGANIZATIONAL TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: This is very large and has a pocket for everything! The color is very nice as well...sort of like a deep purple denim look. No complaints on this one! Makes an excellent gift for any yarn craft person!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bag. It holds all my needles, additional supplies, plus yarns for current projects. The bag has shoulder strap capability in addition to the hand straps. One would have to be careful to not overload it because it could become quite heavy. It is quite roomy and the best addition to my craft supplies thus far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Telson

customer_reviews.title: Handy for crafts!
customer_reviews.text: This crafting bag is amazing. I am able to put multiple skeins of yarn and my projects in the bag. Being able to pull the yarn through is also a neat feature that helps to make sure the yarn does not get tangled and not in a mess pile! It has been great to travel with it and is truly very portable. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A Great Knitting and Crocheting Tote!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all my knitting and crocheting items. Love the clear top, all the sections and pockets for storing craft items. The size is great. Am absolutely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MNWildRose

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has tons of room. I have 9-10 skeins of yarn, my oversize needles, my Kindle Fire, 2 knitting books and all my regular size knitting and crochet needles inside it. Also, the yarn openings are perfect for keeping the yarn from turning into a jumbled mess. There's still room for more stuff, too! Even though it was more expensive that other knitting bags, it is worth the price to me. Happy Knitting!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great for me! I’m new to crochet (I focus on amigurumi so I can’t attest to how this works for bigger projects like blankets) and this keeps everything together beautifully. From my various yarns to my hooks to my hopeful project patterns, there’s a place for it all. The bag itself is well made. The outside is jean material and inside is lined. It did come with a shoulder strap which helps hauling it from room to room. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag a while ago and I love it. I'm doing the Sophie's Universe blanket and the entire kit fits in it perfectly. I did discover that it is moderately water resistant. I spilled a full glass of ginger ale over it and none bled through to the carpet beneath. LOL. Luckily, only a few skeins of yarn got hit with the soda.
customer_reviews.author: Raygan Earl

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best option available here on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I like it, seems like the best over all bag available here on Amazon or elsewhere. The cover version may be worth it if you think you'll leave your bag in the sun or want to hide your contents. Otherwise the cover isn't needed for the price point they want.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It has an insane amount of space, holes to let the yarn through, so you don't have to remove the yarn to use it. Many compartments for many uses. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom for Christmas and she loves it! It’s a great place to just store some of her yarn or to take with her when she’s going somewhere. Also a great place to keep her ongoing projects. Great buy and love the color
customer_reviews.author: Heather Oberley

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: The best yarn storage for mobility. Love this. I can insert multiple yarns, books, hooks into this and tote it where I need to go or put on floor to use to work on crocheted products. High quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kdeanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I teach a crochet group at my church and this is perfect for taking all my supplies. I pretty much take it with me everywhere I love it. It is nice and roomy. I have a blanket and a short in it at the moment but I’m working on. So there is plenty of room for your products and at least 4 to 6 skeins of yarn.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this knitting bag! I recently ordered another cheaper bag and it's true....you get what you pay for! This Teamoy bag is exceptionally well made, and a lot of thought was put into it's construction and amenities. They used quality materials, especially the zippers. And best of all, it was more than reasonably priced. I highly recommend it and I am considering another for myself........I have too many projects planned! ; )
customer_reviews.author: Bev S.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This holds so much and keeps my needles and yarn organized. I like the open concept on top so I’m not fighting with a lid when I pull yarn through the guide holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy_B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for taking Knit/crochet projects anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!!! Is perfect! No complaints what so ever. easily holds several yarns, all my hooks and needles, Nice large area inside for current project and a couple of clear zip pouches so you can see whats in side. Holds everything I need plus some.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Durham

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag! It's very big and well organized so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag! It's very big and well organized so that my yarn and knitting have their own place. It also has a lot of pockets and compartments to put crochet needles or whatever I want in. I couldn't find one better.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law absolutely went crazy over this bag!!! It was her favorite gift of all. Started transferring everything immediately. It always makes you feel good when something excites them that way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Haddon

customer_reviews.title: Oh my you will love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! Absolutely worth the price. I was very surprised at how well it's made and also at the quality. Pleasantly surprised! I take it everywhere with me. The large is really big. It holds a few super sized skeins plus about 6 or more regular sized skeins. Also all my books and patterns, all of my equipment fits with all that yarn and the projects can sit right on top. If you are looking for a crocheting bag, this is the one you want. Trust me! Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Little

customer_reviews.title: Good but not well put together in parts
customer_reviews.text: One of the metal rings that the yard is supposed to go through popped right out also the Velcro part on the inside was connected in correctly the velcro was sewn on to the strip instead of on to the cover. I like the bag , unfortunately if you don’t have yarn in all the pockets the bag tries to collapse on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Get the large you want be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got the large size! I love this bag fits everything I need and then some, my only complaint is with the way the "hing" opens I wish it opened the other way because it pulls up your yarn. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Chesnik

customer_reviews.title: Soft Side Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very well made, and has useful compartments. Disappointed that it arrived folded and collapsed, and a bit wrinkled, and has soft sides and bottom—picture looks otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: KDK in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty of yarn and supplies for a medium sized project. I work on several projects at once and this one is the easiest bag to store my project and take it back out. No twisted and tangled yarn. I plan to buy another soon!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stark

customer_reviews.title: The best yarn bag -its BIG
customer_reviews.text: I love this yarn bag. It's big and roomy with lots of pockets. Well constructed and should last me a long time. The only downside is this one does not have the cover, but I was unwilling to pay the price difference for a cover so I'll just have to keep my cats off it somehow :) overall, I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend it if you are looking for a BIG yarn bag with lots of pockets and features.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for yarn. (Makes sense right?) I love the dividers, and pockets. However I was seriously thinking about buying another one for when I go on vacation for toiletries, makeup, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item Damaged on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love this product except that I received the item damaged, relatively minor damage but damage all the same (picture attached). I have a bag that works great except I have no way to carry on my shoulder because the clip that keeps the strap attached is broken on one side and the minute anything brushes or knocks against it, the bag falls right off my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Banana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Crochet or Knitting Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. It has enough compartments to take care of a crochet project or two and light to carry. It is well constructed and is perfect to take my yarn projects with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big enough for all your projects
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder strap makes this a go anywhere item that keeps all your hooks yarn an projects organized. If you have pets this keeps everything fur free
customer_reviews.author: D. Vengrouskie

product_meta.title: Teamoy Knitting Bag, Yarn Tote Organizer with Inner Divider (Sewn to Bottom) for Crochet Hooks, Knitting Needles(Up to 14”), Project and Supplies, Gray Dots -No Accessories Included
feature_bullets: SPACIOUS INTERIOR WITH DIVIDER: Patent pending. 6 interior compartment with matching holes on the top is great to keep skeins of yarn separated and prevent tearing, tangling or fraying. The inside divisions go all the way to the bottom to prevent small items from running around.

CLEAR TOP: The flexible and clear PVC cover allows you to easily see what inside without opening the bag. The 6 small holes for different colors of yarn to feed through. 3 sets of magic tapes keep yarn in place when not knitting.

SUPERIOR QUALITY: Crafted from Strong nylon material with clear PVC top, lightweight and durable. The top two-way zipper and Magnet snaps design to keep your knitting supplies and projects away from your beloved pets.

SMART DESIGN: Half-open design on the top allows you to put your unfinished projects into the bag without need to cut away the yarn. Front zipper pouch with elastic loops and pocket for crochet hooks and accessories. Side and back pouches to store ultimate guide, knitting supplies, and more.

EASY TO CARRY: The handle and removable adjustable shoulder strap give you option to carry it by hand or on the arm, wear it over the shoulder or across the body like a messenger. A must-have gift for avid knitter, crochet beginner, knitting enthusiasts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,950 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
